transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: (Opening titles with snappy "Mork & Mindy"-type theme music and credits
Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Greetings, I'm Space Ghost. Welcome to the show. (invisos to desk with peppy transition music) On my show tonight, w-- wait a minute, what's this? (picks up piece of paper on his desk) (reads it in low voice) "Tad Eustus Ghostal, this is to inform you that you are the winner of one super deluxe king-sized lawsuit." Lawsuit?! (spews water on camera lens; audience laughter) But who would want to sue lovable me?

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: (appears on monitor, laughing)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Jack Lord! It's Doctor Nightmare, my arch-enemy!

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: That's Dr. Nightmare, Attorney at Law, Mr. Fat Boy. I got my degree at space prison after you unjustly sent me up the galactic river!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Unjustly? You vibro-shocked three galaxies out of existence! You stole fizzy-lifting drinks! And then you tried to steal my brain!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Petty larceny.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: D'ya mind, Zorak? I'm getting sued here.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I don't mind. Go ahead and get sued. See if I care.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Hey, this is serious, Ghostal. My clients are prepared to sue the unitard offa you!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Clients, my asteroid. This is obviously just another one of your stupid supervillain plots.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Oh yeah, weisenheimer? I got your clients right here. (monitor transitions to Jan and Jace)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (stares, with no recognition) The Wonder Twins?

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: You jerk, Tad, it's us, Jan and Jace.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, you two. Eh, figures.

transcript.speaker: Jan
transcript.dialogue: We told you if you didn't return our calls you'd hear from our lawyer. And our lawyer is Dr. Nightmare.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Attorney at Law.

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: You owe us, Tad. We aren't seeing a dime from those reruns.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You signed the contracts, nobody forced you. Much.

transcript.speaker: Jan
transcript.dialogue: We were just kids, Tad. What were you thinking, taking children into space to fight crime? Exposing us to interstellar gases, laser rays, and unearthly atmospheres which stunted our growth?

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: Look at us, we're still teenagers! I'm stuck in a perpetual prepubescence, and it's all your fault!

transcript.speaker: Jan
transcript.dialogue: So we're suing you, for back wages, and damages stemming from emotional distress, mental cruelty, and, for preventing us from receiving the schooling which might have provided us with a future! (breaks down and cries with Jace)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (in control room) (cries)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Aw, those poor kids.

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: I, I'm sorry Dr. Nightmare.

transcript.speaker: Jan
transcript.dialogue: Attorney at Law.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: It's all right, son. Now wipe your nose, you're on television.

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: I'll wipe Space Ghost's...

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Gentlemen! Please! You can fight like itsy bitsy babies later. (clears throat) Right now we have adult name calling and mud-slinging to attend to.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (clears throat) Should I start?

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Oh, by all means.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (takes deep breath) Shyster!

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Poltroon!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ambulence chaser!

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: No talent Hanna-Barbarian!

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: Big meanie!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Knish eater!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Uh.. mumbly peg!

transcript.speaker: Blip
transcript.dialogue: (screeches)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Why's that monkey have to be here anyway?

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I forgot to tell ya, the monkey's suing ya too. Cruelty to animals or something.

transcript.speaker: Blip
transcript.dialogue: (screeches and screeches in background)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Stupid chimp! Smelly eater of filth! (blasts Blip)

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: You creep! Blip's not dirty, I take him into the shower myself to clean his...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Alright, that's enough, joke's over.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: This ain't no joke, Ghostal. I got clients besides the kids and the hairball linin' up to sue the powerbands off ya. Ya ever hear of Cameron Diaz? Flip Orley? Sean Medlock? The Hoover Dam?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I... don't know what you're talking about.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Does France ring a bell at all?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I never touched France!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Sure you did! You blew it up!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh well, maybe I did. C'est la vie.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Look, Ghostal, my midgety clients here would like to settle this lawsuit if you'll be willing to, say, rehire them for your talkshow. Is it a deal?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ih! No can do, Dr. Nightmare!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Attorney at Law.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I've already got two cute useless sidekicks.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I'm not useless!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I'm not cute.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: I'm not Rappaport.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Well, if you won't settle, then I'm forced to sue you for thirty-two million dollars, plus expenses, and a play toy for the chimp.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Whoa! I want in on that lawsuit!

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Okay, sure there, Zorak, on what grounds would you like to sue, you know, Mr. Big Fat Body over there?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Uh, mental cruelty, (cash register sound) physical cruelty, (cash register sound) defamation of cartoon character, (cash register sound)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You rotten kids! This is all your fault! I owe you nothing! Without me you'd be on the Herculoids planet following Gleep and Gloop with brooms! And you two are no longer friends of mine! I'm tellin' that fat geekanerd who does my web page to officially list you two ingrates as enemies from now on.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: I've heard enough, Ghostal, I'm gonna work you over in court like hobos into steaks.

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: Yeah! You haven't got a ghost of a chance, Tad!

transcript.speaker: Jan
transcript.dialogue: Ah, good one, Jace!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (mocking) Eh, good one, Jace! (sputtering) (Dr. Nightmare's image fades from monitor) Oh boy, the Shatner's really hit the fan now. I'm up Dawson's Creek without a paddle.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You know, my uncle Miranda got sued once.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's nice. I'm gonna get my own big-shot lawyer and fight fire with napalm. Moltar, phone book, lawyer, extrapolate!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Napalm. Ah, to be young again. (throws lever, phone book appears on control room monitor, sound of phone dialing, then ringing, and answer)

transcript.speaker: Operator
transcript.dialogue: Your call is being connected with the next available high-priced lawyer. Please stay on the line. (carnival music)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Perry Mason, please.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Matlock! Matlock!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Perry, Perry, Perry, Perry.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Matlock!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Quincy!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (long pause) Quincy's not a lawyer!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: He's better than a lawyer! He's a coroner!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oooh, mama, am I nervous! Sweatin' like a Trekkie! (sniff!) I smell like Oil of Olestra.

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: Ooh, my special jacket.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (whistles) How about that!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oooh.

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: Man...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hi, Miss...

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: Greta Van Susteren, lawyer.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, intergalactic dreamboat. (blinks, with Zorak blink sound)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey! That's my sound effect! I'm suin'!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Me too! I don't have any lines in this show!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You see, Greta, I'm having some legal problems, and...

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: Like what, Space Ghost, maybe I can help you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, it's like this. I used to have these sidekicks, Jan and Jace.

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: Who?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And, well, they hired my old arch-enemy, Dr. Nightmare..

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Attorney at Law.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: .. to sue me.

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: Oh dear, for what?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, stupid stuff. They say I endangered their lives, stunted their emotional and physical development, ripped them off. You know, stupid kid stuff.

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: Well, how many years has this been pending, Space Ghost, and how much do you own them?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, I don't know. Thirty-two million?

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: That's a lot, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, well, y'see, the thing is, they were young when they worked for me.

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: But see, you've now just admitted that you had employed them, now what are you gonna do, Space Ghost? That was a trick, I asked you how long you had employed them, and when they worked for you, and you admitted it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I don't know... Greta, be nice. Aren't you supposed to defend me?

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: I'll defend you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay, where do we start?

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: Cash up front, no credit cards, just cash up front.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: (appears on monitor next to Greta, split screen mode) I'd reconsider that, babe. I just uncovered some damaging evidence against big boy there. Roll that film, Molter.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (throws lever)

transcript.speaker: Jan
transcript.dialogue: Please, Space Ghost, don't make us fight Tyranor and his space piranhas!

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: My lungs just healed from the beating Metallus gave us.

transcript.speaker: Blip
transcript.dialogue: (whimpers with head bandages)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You little wimps make me sick! Do you want to go back to the home? Is that it? Huh?!

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: (sniff) No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well then, stop sniveling and go capture Tyranor! I'll... catch up with you later. I'm, uh, gonna go get a quesadilla.

transcript.speaker: Jan
transcript.dialogue: Jace! Look out!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You losers! No dinner for you tonight!

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: And don't think I forgot about Paris! I got that on tape too!

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: You're kidding!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, he, uh... I, kind of zapped...

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: What, did you zap Paris?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, you know, they bugged me, with, with their Frenchness.

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: Well, maybe, Space Ghost, maybe you have a little problem.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What do you mean?

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: Well, it seems like you're provoking these lawsuits.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Does that mean I'm in trouble?

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I think you are in a lot of trouble.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh boy, oh boy.

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: And I just think it's hopeless for you. I think it's absolutely hopeless. I don't think anything's going to help you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (distraught) Come on, think of something!

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: I, you know what, we may be able to work a little deal out, Space Ghost, to help both of us.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You think so?

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: I'm listening.

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: Well, could Dr. Nightmare come, uh, tomorrow?

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Sure thing, babe. Maybe we could work something out over dinner, what do you say?

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: No deals! We want our money!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Come on, kids, can't we all just get along?

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: You know, I've been in jail.

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: Really?

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: For stealing a brain.

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: For stealing a brain?

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, it was Space Ghost's brain.

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: You really shouldn't steal someone's brain.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: I suppose, but I kept part of it.

transcript.speaker: Jan
transcript.dialogue: Jace...

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: Tad, you pay up, or I'll tell everybody what you did to Dino Boy.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Prepare for a blast from my spank ray.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Don't you address my pimply client that way!

transcript.speaker: Jan
transcript.dialogue: You tell him, Dr. Nightmare!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Greta! Legal advice! Now!

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: I don't know, you're Space Ghost, can't you do anything?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I could plead the fifth!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: If you can count that high.

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: I think you have a problem, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Look, Greta, we both work for Turner.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: Whoa, hold on second. (four kinds of dramatic sting music, followed by whimsical music) Turner? You mean, Ted Turner?

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: Is there a problem, Dr. Nightmare?

transcript.speaker: All
transcript.dialogue: Attorney at Law.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: You bet there's a problem. You see, Ted Turner.. is my father. (whimsical music again) Sorry, kids, but you're on your own. I'll fax you my bill. See you later.

transcript.speaker: Jan
transcript.dialogue: This is all your fault, Jace. We could have listened to Harvey and been Birdboy and Birdgirl, but noooo, you had to have inviso power! I hate you, I hate you, I hate you!

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: Jan! (his voice is breaking) Jan! Get a grip on... (clears throat) .. on yourself!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What was that?

transcript.speaker: Jace
transcript.dialogue: (with deeper voice) I've hit puberty! Yippee! Sorry, Jan, I gotta go. I've got.. things to do.

transcript.speaker: Jan
transcript.dialogue: Oh well, that's that, guess I can always write a tell-all about my brilliant career with Space Jerk.

transcript.speaker: Greta Van Susteren
transcript.dialogue: It sounds like you're home free again, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (drum beat & disco music begins in background) And now that I've beaten the legal system to a bloody lifeless pulp, it's your turn!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Uh oh.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sue me, will you?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Moltar! Help me!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (dials 911 on his monitor)

transcript.speaker: Operator
transcript.dialogue: Please state your emergency.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Eh, I'd like to report a felony in progress.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (behind bars, on Moltar's monitor) Moltar, you fink!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) (coughs)

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: (clears throat)
